mapper.sql: ID,OWNER, HOTEL_ORDER_NO AS hotelOrderNo, SALE_ORDER_NO AS saleOrderNo, BUY_ORDER_NO AS buyOrderNo, HOTEL_CODE AS hotelCode,HOTEL_NAME AS hotelName, ORDER_TYPE AS orderType, CONTACT_NAME AS contactName, CONTACT_NUMBER AS contactNumber, CANCEL_TIME AS cancelTime, ARRIVAL_DATE AS arrivalDate, DEPARTURE_DATE AS departureDate, TOTAL_PRICE AS totalPrice, TOTAL_REFUND AS totalRefund, GUEST_NAME AS guestName, REMARK, LOCKER, LOCK_TIME AS lockTime, CREATOR, CREATE_ORDER_TIME AS createOrderTime, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME AS modifyTime, PRODUCT_UNIQUE_ID AS productUniqueId, BOOK_COUNT AS bookCount, PAYMENT_SIGN AS paymentSign, BANK_ID AS bankId, BANK_NAME AS bankName, CARD_NUMBER AS cardNumber, CARD_USER_NAME AS cardUserName, CARD_VALUE_DATE AS cardValueDate, CREDENTIAL_NAME AS credentialName, CREDENTIAL_NUMBER AS credentialNumber, CARD_MOBILE AS cardMobile, ORDER_STATUS AS orderStatus, MSG, IS_AFFIRM AS isAffirm, RESULT_CODE AS resultCode, NIGHT_COUNT AS nightCount, PRO_ID AS proId, HOTEL_ADDRESS AS hotelAddress, HOTEL_PHONE AS hotelPhone, PRO_NAME AS proName, TC_ORDER_STATUS AS tcOrderStatus, TRANSATION_ORDER_NO AS transationOrderNo, GUEST_MOBILE AS guestMobile, DB_ORDER_TYPE AS dbOrderType, DB_ORDER_MONEY AS dbOrderMoney, DB_CANCEL_RULE AS dbCancelRule, CANCEL_PENALTY AS cancelPenalty, EARLY_ARRIVE_TIME AS earlyArriveTime, LATEST_ARRIVE_TIME AS latestArriveTime, CUSTOMER_NO AS customerNo, SUPPLIER_NO AS supplierNo, CARD_VALUE_CODE AS cardValueCode, ARRIVE_HOTEL_TIME AS arriveHotelTime, REQUEST_CODE AS requestCode, REQUEST_TEXT AS requestText, REQUEST_NAME AS requestName, FACT_ARRIVE_TIME AS factArriveTime, FACT_LEAVE_TIME AS factLeaveTime, FACT_GUEST_NAME AS factGuestName, FACT_NIGHT_COUNT AS factNightCount, FACT_PRO_COUNT AS factProCount, EACH_NIGHT_PRICE AS eachNightPrice, FACT_TOTAL_PRICE AS factTotalPrice, BREAKFAST_COUNT AS breakfastCount, SUPPLIER_NUMBER AS supplierNumber, SUP_PRICE_NAME AS supPriceName, BED_TYPE_NAME AS bedTypeName, FACT_TOTAL_REFUND AS factTotalRefund, RELATE_ORDER_NO AS relateOrderNo
mapper.select: select hho.ID, hho.HOTEL_ORDER_NO, hho.SALE_ORDER_NO, hho.BUY_ORDER_NO, hho.HOTEL_CODE, hho.HOTEL_NAME, hho.ORDER_TYPE, hho.CONTACT_NAME, hho.CONTACT_NUMBER, hho.CANCEL_TIME, hho.ARRIVAL_DATE, hho.DEPARTURE_DATE, hho.TOTAL_PRICE, hho.TOTAL_REFUND, hho.GUEST_NAME, hho.REMARK, hho.CREATOR, hho.CREATE_ORDER_TIME, hho.MODIFIER, hho.MODIFY_TIME, hho.PRODUCT_UNIQUE_ID, hho.BOOK_COUNT, hho.PAYMENT_SIGN, hho.BANK_ID, hho.BANK_NAME, hho.CARD_NUMBER, hho.CARD_USER_NAME, hho.CARD_VALUE_DATE, hho.CREDENTIAL_NAME, hho.CREDENTIAL_NUMBER, hho.CARD_MOBILE, hho.ORDER_STATUS, hho.MSG, hho.IS_AFFIRM, hho.RESULT_CODE, hho.NIGHT_COUNT, hho.OWNER, hho.PRO_ID, hho.HOTEL_ADDRESS, hho.HOTEL_PHONE, hho.PRO_NAME, hho.TC_ORDER_STATUS, hho.TRANSATION_ORDER_NO, hho.GUEST_MOBILE, hho.DB_ORDER_TYPE, hho.DB_ORDER_MONEY, hho.DB_CANCEL_RULE, hho.CANCEL_PENALTY, hho.EARLY_ARRIVE_TIME, hho.LATEST_ARRIVE_TIME, hho.CUSTOMER_NO, hho.SUPPLIER_NO, hho.CARD_VALUE_CODE, hho.ARRIVE_HOTEL_TIME, hho.REQUEST_CODE, hho.REQUEST_TEXT, hho.REQUEST_NAME, hho.FACT_ARRIVE_TIME, hho.FACT_LEAVE_TIME, hho.FACT_GUEST_NAME, hho.FACT_NIGHT_COUNT, hho.FACT_PRO_COUNT, hho.EACH_NIGHT_PRICE, hho.FACT_TOTAL_PRICE, hho.BREAKFAST_COUNT, hho.SUPPLIER_NUMBER, hho.LOCKER, hho.LOCK_TIME, hho.SUP_PRICE_NAME, hho.BED_TYPE_NAME, hho.FACT_TOTAL_REFUND, hho.RELATE_ORDER_NO, su.NAME from HOL_HOTEL_ORDER hho, SM_USER su where hho.CREATOR = su.LOGIN_NAME AND hho.HOTEL_ORDER_NO = #{hotelOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select hho.ID, hho.HOTEL_ORDER_NO, hho.SALE_ORDER_NO, hho.BUY_ORDER_NO, hho.HOTEL_CODE, hho.HOTEL_NAME, hho.ORDER_TYPE, hho.CONTACT_NAME, hho.CONTACT_NUMBER, hho.CANCEL_TIME, hho.ARRIVAL_DATE, hho.DEPARTURE_DATE, hho.TOTAL_PRICE, hho.TOTAL_REFUND, hho.GUEST_NAME, hho.REMARK, hho.CREATOR, hho.CREATE_ORDER_TIME, hho.MODIFIER, hho.MODIFY_TIME, hho.PRODUCT_UNIQUE_ID, hho.BOOK_COUNT, hho.PAYMENT_SIGN, hho.BANK_ID, hho.BANK_NAME, hho.CARD_NUMBER, hho.CARD_USER_NAME, hho.CARD_VALUE_DATE, hho.CREDENTIAL_NAME, hho.CREDENTIAL_NUMBER, hho.CARD_MOBILE, hho.ORDER_STATUS, hho.MSG, hho.IS_AFFIRM, hho.RESULT_CODE, hho.NIGHT_COUNT, hho.OWNER, hho.PRO_ID, hho.HOTEL_ADDRESS, hho.HOTEL_PHONE, hho.PRO_NAME, hho.TC_ORDER_STATUS, hho.TRANSATION_ORDER_NO, hho.GUEST_MOBILE, hho.DB_ORDER_TYPE, hho.DB_ORDER_MONEY, hho.DB_CANCEL_RULE, hho.CANCEL_PENALTY, hho.EARLY_ARRIVE_TIME, hho.LATEST_ARRIVE_TIME, hho.CUSTOMER_NO, hho.SUPPLIER_NO, hho.CARD_VALUE_CODE, hho.ARRIVE_HOTEL_TIME, hho.REQUEST_CODE, hho.REQUEST_TEXT, hho.REQUEST_NAME, hho.FACT_ARRIVE_TIME, hho.FACT_LEAVE_TIME, hho.FACT_GUEST_NAME, hho.FACT_NIGHT_COUNT, hho.FACT_PRO_COUNT, hho.EACH_NIGHT_PRICE, hho.FACT_TOTAL_PRICE, hho.BREAKFAST_COUNT, hho.SUPPLIER_NUMBER, hho.LOCKER, hho.LOCK_TIME, hho.SUP_PRICE_NAME, hho.BED_TYPE_NAME, hho.FACT_TOTAL_REFUND, hho.RELATE_ORDER_NO, su.NAME from HOL_HOTEL_ORDER hho, SM_USER su where hho.CREATOR = su.LOGIN_NAME AND hho.SALE_ORDER_NO = #{saleOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
